Title: Is Another Dragon's Treasure?
Description:
I must admit, I am out of my depth here. 

It is of black dragon make. The decoration on the pommel matches, but I have no idea what it is. Which I suppose is the point.

I have heard you have travelled the Isles. Do you have any recommendations on who to talk to?
ObjectivesText: Talk to Voraxian in the Forbidden Reach.

Objectives.Text: Suggest a suitable person to Voraxian
